Scopes.description: By using this permission, an app can receive a unique identifier for the user in the form of the sub claim. The permission also gives the app access to the UserInfo endpoint. The openid scope can be used at the Microsoft identity platform token endpoint to acquire ID tokens. The app can use these tokens for authentication.
The email scope can be used with the openid scope and any other scopes. It gives the app access to the user's primary email address in the form of the email claim.

When a user approves the offline_access scope, your app can receive refresh tokens from the Microsoft identity platform token endpoint. Refresh tokens are long-lived. Your app can get new access tokens as older ones expire.
In order to access the SimpleTrading.WebApi (backend).
